title: Permabanned until I change my club name and summoner name
body: I've done as instructed in the support ticket and I kind of want to play League today, how long does this take?

replies.body: Go ahead and shoot that agent a response in your ticket and they'll be able to get everything taken care of for you! Even if the ticket is closed now, you should be able to open it back up by responding to it, and if not, feel free to create a new one.
